Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Successful \Suc*cess"ful\, a. Resulting in success; assuring, or promotive of, success; accomplishing what was proposed; having the desired effect; hence, prosperous; fortunate; happy; as, a successful use of medicine; a successful experiment; a successful enterprise. [1913 Webster]
Welcome, nephews, from successful wars. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Happy; prosperous; fortunate; auspicious; lucky. See {Fortunate}. [1913 Webster] -- {Suc*cess"ful*ly}, adv. -- {Suc*cess"ful*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
successful adj : having succeeded or being marked by a favorable outcome; "a successful architect"; "a successful business venture" [ant: {unsuccessful}]
